content: the dylan head warmers are crocheted using bulky weight yarn but can be adjusted for any weight yarn the cuff is crocheted first and then the remaining is crocheted on making it a seamless & easy project a full video tutorial helps visual learners https //youtu be/-giqhvhkgeg pattern details ▶ beginner level pattern ▶ sizes adjustable s/m/l ▶ uses bulky yarn adjustable for any size ▶ size us i & k ▶ yarn needle ▶ written in u s terms ▶ you may sell the finished items but please credit me and reference back to designs by phanessa and link to pattern site
